member.name: M:IpMatcher.Matcher.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a node to the match list.

member.name: M:IpMatcher.Matcher.Exists(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if an entry exists in the match list.

member.name: M:IpMatcher.Matcher.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Remove an entry from the match list.

member.name: M:IpMatcher.Matcher.MatchExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if an IP address matches something in the match list.
member.returns: True if a match is found.
